name: Railway Gun Simulator
description:
Finally another Sim!

This was mostly a project to learn Unity though. I consider it as released. However, if somebody wants to contribute a nice terrain, you are welcome. I didn't really feel the itch to dig deeper into this.

Linux version is up! (tested on Ubuntu, see info when downloading)

Hint: The game might run like crap on a lot of machines when viewing the gun as its model has been pulled from Turbosquid without any real optimization. Therefore you can turn off shadows which should help a bit.

If the web player on this side is slow at loading you can also try it here

Please send feedback and bugs to games@ak85.de

Have fun!

Ashtorak

v1.1: made Dora projectile impact plumes bigger and staying longer for better visibility and added hint that there is a zoom button (right mouse)
